jobTransform.doc: Test detector functionality for ISF FullG4 using ttbar events
Test detector functionality for ISF G4 using ttbar
Test detector functionality for ISF G4 using ttbar
jobTransform.jobTransformCmd: Sim_tf.py --simulator MC12G4 --truthStrategy MC15 --randomSeed 0 --enableLooperKiller True --maxEvents 4 --skipEvents 0 --geometryVersion ATLAS-GEO-20-00-01 --conditionsTag OFLCOND-MC12-SIM-00 --inputEVNTFile "/afs/cern.ch/atlas/offline/ProdData/16.6.X/16.6.7.Y/ttbar_muplusjets-pythia6-7000.evgen.pool.root" --outputHITSFile "Hits.pool.root" --postInclude=G4AtlasTests/postInclude.DCubeTest.py

jobTransform.doc: Test detector functionality for ISF G4 using ttbar
Tests detector functionality for ISF FullG4 truth and beam transformation using minbias events in the innerdetector
Digitiziation without pile-up, with additional modifications for AFII inputs.
Tests detector functionality for ISF G4 truth and beam transformation using minbias events in the innerdetector
Merge job for backward compatibility with 17.3.13

Running cosmic simulation transform from track records
jobTransform.jobTransformCmd: Sim_tf.py --simulator MC12G4 --inputEVNT_COSMICSFile /afs/cern.ch/atlas/offline/ProdData/16.6.X/16.6.7.Y/Cosmics.TR.pool.root --outputHITSFile testCosmics.HITS.pool.root --maxEvents -1 --randomSeed 1234 --DataRunNumber '10' --geometryVersion ATLAS-R2-2015-01-01-00 --conditionsTag OFLCOND-RUN12-SDR-01 --firstEvent 0 --physicsList QGSP_BERT --preInclude SimulationJobOptions/preInclude.Cosmics.py --beamType cosmics

jobTransform.doc: Running cosmic simulation transform from track records
Tests detector functionality for ISF ATLFASTII-like configuration using ttbar events
jobTransform.jobTransformCmd: Sim_tf.py --simulator ATLFASTII --randomSeed 123 --enableLooperKiller True --maxEvents 500 --skipEvents 0 --geometryVersion ATLAS-GEO-20-00-01 --conditionsTag OFLCOND-MC12-SIM-00 --inputEVNTFile /afs/cern.ch/atlas/offline/ProdData/16.6.X/16.6.7.Y/ttbar_muplusjets-pythia6-7000.evgen.pool.root --outputHITSFile Hits.pool.root --postInclude=G4AtlasTests/postInclude.DCubeTest.py
